data.scheme_name: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Udhyog Uday Yojana for SC/ST Entrepreneurs for MSME - Assistance to special Entrepreneurship Training with 360 degree approach with mentoring support and sustenance allowance for Promoters/Entrepreneurs - Assistance for Special Entrepreneurship Training - SC/ST - Existing
data.benefits: Government proving assistance of Assistance @100% of course fees maximum up to Rs. 10,000 per month per person, duration of training program should not be less than for 6 months, and max up to one year
data.eligibility: Universities/ Management institutions/ entrepreneurship development institutions/ center of excellence/ Centre of Entrepreneurship Development (CED) that intent to provide training for entrepreneurship developments. Such institution shall have to obtain approval of the State Level Empowered Committee (SLEC).
data.conditions:
1. The training session shall consist of conducting pre-training diagnostics, conducting experimental training session and creating post training environment.
  2. The duration of the training programme should not be less than for 6 months and maximum up to 1 year.
  3. There should not be duplication of training run by the Government.
data.beneficiaries: Universities/ Management institutions/ entrepreneurship development institutions/ center of excellence/ Centre of Entrepreneurship Development (CED) that intent to provide training for entrepreneurship developments. Such institution shall have to obtain approval of the State Level Empowered Committee (SLEC).
data.prerequisites:
1. The training session shall consist of conducting pre-training diagnostics, conducting experimental training session and creating post training environment.
  2. The duration of the training programme should not be less than for 6 months and maximum up to 1 year.
  3. There should not be duplication of training run by the Government.
data.context: The Industrial Policy 2020 envisions Gujarat as a global business destination for next-generation sustainable manufacturing and service industry that stimulates sustainable development, inclusive and a balanced regional growth. The primary mission of the Industrial Policy includes support for development of MSMEs, focus on Export Competitiveness : Vocal for Local to become Global and thus strengthen integrated value chains across product segments.
data.objective: To provide 360 degree support and hand holding oriented towards strengthening the eco-system for promoters and entrepreneurs for providing unique knowledge of entrepreneurship on functional area of management, soft skills, assessments, finance, inventory, sales, marketing, e-commerce, logistics and best practices.
data.description: The assistance for special entrepreneurship training with 360 degree approach at 100% of course fees, maximum up to Rs. 10000 per person per month will be payable to nodal institution.
data.how_to_apply: Applicants can apply directly to State Level Empowered Committee.
data.funding_facilitator: Industries and Mines Department, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: The assistance will be release after the training session.
data.additional_info: The enterprise that has availed assistance under this component cannot avail asssistance under any other scheme of other department of state government for the same component providing similar benefit. However, Enterprise can avail under such schemes of Government of India, if any.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Copy of Udyam Registration (if applicable) 
2. Copy of the Constitution of the enterprise (MOA or AOA) 
3. Copy of PAN Card of Enterprise 
4. Copy of PAN Card of Applicant/Promoters/Directors/partners and authorised signatory 
5. CA certificate for fixed capital investment 
6. Copy of Gujarat Pollution Control Board approved NOC/Consent & other departments approval (if applicable) 
7. Copy of GST Registration (if applicable) 
8. Copy of GST return of previous financial year (if applicable) 
9. Copy of ITR of the last financial year (if applicable) 
10. Self-Attested documents/ details to be submitted by the Authorized Person 
11. Power of attorney/Board resolution/ Consent letter 
12. Supporting Documents for SC/ST Enterprise
data.checklist_info_d:
Address:
Industries Commissionerate (MSME Incentive),
4th Floor, Block No. 1, Udyog Bhavan, Sector 11, 
Gandhinagar-382010

For other addresses visit- https://msmec.gujarat.gov.in/districtindustrieslist 

Email id: msmeinc@gujarat.gov.in / dci-msme-inc@gujarat.gov.in / io-msme-inc@gujarat.gov.in
Contact Details: 079 23258386, 079 23258387, 079 23258381
